isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - LIGHT SYSTEMS - DESCRIPTION - Cab And Trailer Lights Switch and Relays Wiring

svcproc.title: Cab And Trailer Lights Switch and Relays Wiring
svcproc.para: The cab and trailer lights switch is a switch that is used to flash (momentarily turn off) the tractor and trailer clearance and tail lights. Thus the truck operator can thank the driver of the vehicle he has just passed for flashing his headlights, signaling that it is safe to merge back into the driving lane.
